definitions.definition: the art and study of designing buildings

examples.text: She's a professor of architecture at the University of Oregon.

definitions.definition: the design or style of a building or buildings

examples.text: the architecture of the eighteenth century
There are examples of most styles of architecture in the town.

definitions.definition: the design and structure of a computer system

wordOrigin: mid 16th cent.: from Latin architectura, from architectus from Greek arkhitektōn, from arkhi- ‘chief’ + tektōn ‘builder’.
